about_the_game:
Welcome to your village in the kingdom, manage resources, complete tasks and events in real-time, get gold and materials from dungeons, win a new castle, steal items from magic characters, increase affinity and work on your popularity. And more in the Medieval Clicker. The magic dragon awaits you.

In the ancient lands of the kingdom of Pixelor, every village wants to be recognized.
Earning gold is essential to grow among the others. Affinity is a precious gain. For this reason you have the opportunity to be the best village in the kingdom, your work will be rewarded. Earn your glory and the best castle.

Farm Gold Coins for the wealth of the village.
Send expeditions to gather items and different resources.
Get Chemistry to increase research.
Strengthen your village and castle to reach the highest level.
Practice trade to exchange gold and resources.
Increase affinity with the love of the villagers.
Rank up to get a better castle.
Fight in dungeons to steal gold and special materials.
Increase experience and population density to level up.
Get water and food in abundance for your villagers.
All actions will increase your status.

[] The Magic Dragon*
*ALL EVENTS DESACTIVATED IN THE DEMO

More than 33 real-time events.
Login Status and Login Reward.
Play time is rewarded with direct rewards.
Chests from all over the kingdom will be given to you.
Hit the Magic Rabbit to steal its items.
Complete Quick Jobs to gain rank, gold, and affinity.
Special Days and Events reward you.
Try to hunt down the Lucky Goblin to steal from him.
More enemies and more rewards in the dungeons.
The Magic Dragon will give you items and level.
...and more surprises to discover.

Medieval Clicker is here. It's your village... in the kingdom.
